name: calendar_app_promo
description: Clean promotional template featuring a calendar app interface

samples.heading: Plan your day in a snap

fieldPrompt.image_url: Upload a high-quality image with transparent background that represents your business or product. For best results, use a clear, well-lit photo with good contrast.
fieldPrompt.heading: Enter a compelling headline (max 50 characters) that captures attention and communicates your main message or value proposition.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your business logo with transparent background (PNG format). The logo should be clear and recognizable at different sizes.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website URL (e.g., 'yourbusiness.com'). Omit 'http://' or 'www' for a cleaner look.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (e.g., #4A90E2) that matches your brand. This will be used as the background color.
